tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
quoteText:
Your browser may allow you to set a Do Not Track (DNT) signal indicating that you do not wish your online activity to be tracked.
Currently, our system does not support and cannot act on DNT signal headers that we may receive.
